title: Haunted House - Sound Effects
description: horror SFX and SoundScape for your game!
longDescription:
This Haunted House package has been designed with the sounds that will possibly occur in this scenario in mind.

Doors opening and creaking, chairs moving, objects breaking, screaming, monster attacks, clocks, static, and more!


The effects are divided into:

Loop Sfx


1. Chair

2. Clock (3 variations)

3. Cuckoo Clock (3 variations)

4. Door Knock (3 variations)

5. HeartBeat (3 variations)

6. Monster_Dragging (3 variations)

7. Phone Ring (3 variations)

8. Scared Breath (4 variations)

9. Static (3 variations)

10. Steps Wood Squeak (3 variations)

11. Water Drop


OneShot Sfx


1. Bell (3 variations)

2. Clean Scream (3 variations)

3. Door_Locked (3 variations)

4. Door_Squeak (3 variations)

5. Glass Breaking (3 variations)

6. Heavy_Steps_Wood (4 variations)

7. Horror_Whoosh (3 variations)

8. Impact_Scream (3 variations)

9. Monster_Attack (3 variations)

10. Old_Gate (3 variations)

11. Monster_Attack (3 variations)

12. Scream_Woman (3 variations)

13. Knife_Hit(3 variations)

14. Baby Laught (3 variations)

15. Cinematic Impact (3 variations)


SoundScape

  1. Rain
  2. SoundScape Wind


This pack will be updated constantly, and the price over time should go up, however if you have already purchased the following updates will be free.


License:

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to remix or claim as your own work.

Important/Additional Notes: The font used is Kingthings Trypewriter 2 Font free distributed by 1001 fonts, the photo is from Peter Hermrmann free distributed by PixaBay
